meanings.definition: A person displaying excessive patriotism or loyalty to a particular group or cause.
meanings.sent1: Some chauvinists only support their country and ignore others.
meanings.sent2: The chauvinists proudly waved their country's flag at the parade.
meanings.sent3: The chauvinists insisted their team was the best, even when they lost.
meanings.sent4: She was such a chauvinist for her favorite band, she never listened to any other music.
meanings.sent5: The chauvinists' unwavering loyalty to their cause inspired others to join.

meanings.definition: A person displaying excessive prejudice or bias in favor of their own gender.
meanings.sent1: Some chauvinists believe only their gender can succeed in certain jobs.
meanings.sent2: The chauvinists refused to consider a female candidate for the position.
meanings.sent3: The chauvinists at the office always made jokes about the opposite gender.
meanings.sent4: He was a chauvinist in his views, thinking his gender was superior in every way.
meanings.sent5: The chauvinists' bias towards their own gender created tension in the workplace.
